name: Save The Ship (SingaDin)
description:
My first game and first project

version 0.58.70а

save the ship from waves of enemies!

if your hp is 0 or less, reload the page

1> - Wave

control:

W|A|S|D - Ship control

Left mouse button - Shoot

Esc - Pause
